**The Supreme Method of the Golden Mother of Highest Clarity for Seeking Immortality**

*Scripture Title:* The Supreme Method of the Golden Mother of Highest Clarity for Seeking Immortality
*Composed by:* Li Xuanzhen, Daoist of Mount Lu, Tang Dynasty
*Compiled and translated from talismanic scripts in the* Scripture of Numinous Treasure

One scroll. Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Section of Mysterious Cavern*, *Category of Spirit Talismans*.

---

**The Supreme Method of the Golden Mother of Highest Clarity for Seeking Immortality**
*Expounded by* Li Xuanzhen of Mount Lu

The Queen Mother of Highest Clarity addressed the Supreme Lord of the Dao, saying: "I humbly inquire—within the *Scripture of Numinous Treasure*, there exist talismanic diagrams and written texts. Their script is arcane and concealed, and I have not yet received their instruction. Day and night, I revere and gaze upon them, yet dare not presume to approach the numinous countenance.

Though I am unworthy and dwell in the office of Governing Perfection, I have not yet discerned the talismanic formulae. Might they be transmitted to me now? If I could be enlightened in what I have not yet heard, it would be as though I were lifted from obscurity, and my destiny would unfold naturally."

The Lord of the Dao replied: "The texts of the *Numinous Treasure* originated in the Dragon Han era and have endured to this day, passing through kalpas as numerous as grains of sand. The talismanic diagrams are treasured and secret, their script profound and obscure. In ancient times, the Primordial Beginning refined the true script with fire, causing it to gleam and radiate. Once the script became manifest, I came to understand it.

The Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning then commanded the Five Elders to assist in guarding the talismanic formulae of the Five True Scripts, which were concealed within the Golden Tower. None but those who attain the Dao and achieve perfection may come to know them fully.

In former times, the Primordial Heavenly King, upon the Golden Lattice and Jade Terrace, bestowed the talismanic sounds and formulae, permitting their transmission to those of the Dao. It was foretold that in the span of one kalpa, a distant age would produce a sage of lofty virtue, one of the White Emperor’s Western Numinous essence, who would seek these texts.

Now that you have inquired, the sign is already clear. I shall not conceal them but shall expound and proclaim them. You should treasure and record them, taking care not to disseminate them lightly. Should one obtain them, the immortal Dao is thereby attained.

Herein, I have transcribed them into a single scroll. First, the true talismans are drawn, and their sounds are explained. There are nineteen talismans of the Great Simplicity and Yang Generation, their script sealed and secret. Within the great and lesser kalpas, their destined time of emergence may yet be awaited.

Now, I transmit to you the true talismans as revealed in the *Numinous Treasure*, with their sounds explained as follows. The talismans within this scroll are all inscribed in vermilion."

---

**First: Explanation of the Sounds of the Ten True Scripts of the Five Directions**

**Sound says:**
*"The Nine Qi of Azure Heaven illuminate the true Dao. Gather the qi—treasured by all perfected beings."*
*(Seventeen characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Sun and moon are fixed; mountains and rivers unfold. The great celebration of the Three Heavens—all perfected ones wander in joy."*
*(Sixteen characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the two talismans of the East.**

**Sound says:**
*"The Primordial August Thearch opens heaven and earth."*
*(Eight characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"The Jade Tone exhales qi; the Three Simplicities follow the law. Preserve life, fix immortality—sealed by the Jade Calendar."*
*(Sixteen characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the two talismans of the South.**

**Sound says:**
*"Gather and command all immortals; restrain and summon the sources of rivers."*
*(Eight characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Summon heaven and earth; the Nine Origins are judged. United with the Kingly Qi, the August Thearch gazes from afar."*
*(Yellow Emperor. Eighteen characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the two talismans of the Center.**

**Sound says:**
*"Practice perfection, gather qi, rectify the myriad spirits."*
*(Seven characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Urge the Five Elders’ chariot; gaze west to the Nine Capitals. In kalpas beyond count, they assemble—brightly fixing the Nine Rivers."*
*(Luo Heaven. Eighteen characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the two talismans of the West.**

**Sound says:**
*"The Mysterious Loftiness of Jade Clarity summons and commands the Northern Feng."*
*(Eight characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"The Northern Dipper fixes the assembly; the nine cycles scatter like radiance. The Eight Poles shine like stone; the Mysterious Essence flourishes."*
*(Fourteen characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the two talismans of the North.**

**Second: Sounds of the Two Talismans on the Upper and Lower Divination Boards**

**Sound says:**
*"Heavenly Numinous Marshal, the Great One ascends to heaven; on earth, it opens the Gate of Life. The Mandate of Heaven commands awe; the Lord of Corpses, the Star King, the Mandate of Earth issues forth. The Moon measures heaven and earth."*
*(Twenty-eight characters.)*

**Right: Sound of the upper talisman on the divination board.**

**Middle board, alternate text**

**Sound says:**
*"Wisdom flourishes, slashing open the mountain courtyard of humanity."*
*(Seven characters.)*

**Third: Sounds of the Five Talismans in the Crimson Staff**

**Right: Sounds of the five talismans in the crimson staff.**
*(The Life Talisman follows the directional script.)*

**Fourth: Sounds of the Three Divisions’ Twenty-Four Life Talismans**

**Upper Division: Sounds of the eight talismans.**
*(Each four characters form one verse, totaling thirty-two sounds.)*

**Right: Sounds of the eight talismans of the Middle Division.**
*(Each four characters form one verse, totaling thirty-two sounds.)*

**Right: Sounds of the eight talismans of the Lower Division.**
*(Each four characters form one verse, totaling thirty-two sounds.)*

**Fifth: Sounds of the Eight Radiant Registers’ Talismans of the Five Directions’ Demon Kings’ Names and Taboos**

**Right: Sounds of the Eight Radiant Registers’ talismans of the Five Directions’ Demon Kings’ names and taboos.**
*(The script is uniform; the incantations consist of two verses.)*

**Sixth: Sounds of the Three Divisions’ Eight Radiant Three Chapters of Jade Text Talismans**

**Sound says:**
*"The heavens above are void and nonexistent; the Mysterious Cavern’s nine and five, the Supreme’s E-Pang, governs the numinous and awesome portal. The Jade Balance gathers qi; the brain’s blossom gazes into the Mysterious. It commands the Upper Division, communicating with spirits and reaching antiquity."*
*(Thirty-two characters, written in blue-green ink.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Vermilion Clarity opens the true; the Three Heavens’ qi harmonizes. The Cavernous Cinnabar shines with yang radiance; the five viscera do not wither. Protected by the Cinnabar Heaven, the Vermilion Palace supports renewal. Ingesting and refining the flowing spring, the primordial life knows no decay."*
*(Thirty-two characters, written in purple ink.)*
*(One version reads: "Protected by the Three Qi.")*

**Sound says:**
*"The Yellow Center governs qi; primordial life arises in freedom. The stomach’s duct communicates in seclusion; the six bowels are all preserved. The White Primordial Lord, Peach Blossom’s virtue pure, nurtures the Vermilion Cinnabar. The Cavern Spirit comes and goes."*
*(Thirty-two characters, written in yellow ink.)*
*(One version reads: "Primordial life arises in dignity.")*

**Right: Sounds of the Three Divisions’ Eight Radiant Three Chapters of Jade Text Talismans.**
*(Total: ninety-six words.)*

**Seventh: Talisman Following the Eight Radiant Registers**

**Sound says:**
*"Sun, moon, and the seven stars, the upper Three Heavens’ primordial, unite with the nine generations of ancestors. By the Great Perfected’s statutes and covenant, the immortals and jade maidens, the Cavern’s eighty-one Numinous Treasures’ Guardian Perfected Master King, deliver so-and-so’s hun-soul. In life and death, we share this covenant."*
**Right: Sound of the talisman following the Eight Radiant Registers.**

**Eighth: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Teeth Jade Text Talismans**

**Sound says:**
*"Eastern Bluegreen Tooth: consume and ingest the Bluegreen Tooth; drink the morning mist."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Southern Vermilion Cinnabar: consume and ingest the Vermilion Cinnabar; drink from the Cinnabar Pool."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Central Wu-Earth: lofty and towering, the Great Mountain. Consume and ingest the essence and qi; drink the sweet spring."*
*(Sixteen characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Western Bright Stone: consume and ingest the Bright Stone; drink the numinous liquid."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Northern Mysterious Essence: consume and ingest the Mysterious Essence; drink the jade syrup."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Teeth Jade Text Talismans.**

**Sixty-four characters. Ninth: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Appellations Talismans**

**Sound says:**
*"Eastern Bright Capital Bureau: summon and record the Azure Heaven; wander among the starry lodges, where the Two Qi brightly divide."*

**Sound says:**
*"Southern Life of the Hundred Liáo: the Three Qi ride the Mysterious; summon the Perfected to bow in submission—none fail to assist the numinous."*

**Sound says:**
*"Western Riding the Girdled Perfected: the Jade Dao refines the plain silk; restrain and command tigers and leopards, the net and mesh firmly spread."*

**Sound says:**
*"Northern Mysterious Great Spirit: govern and ride the Primal Net; the Seven Dipper revolves, and the hundred demons hide themselves."*

**Sound says:**
*"Central Charioteer of the Eight Directions: vast as a dragon in flight; girded on the left with the Fire Bell, the Celestial Net resists radiance."*

**Right: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Appellations Talismans.**

**Tenth: Sound of the Fixed Resolve’s Two Halves Initially Divided**

The Deathless’s Origin,
The Deathless’s Mysterious,
The Deathless’s Beginning,
The Deathless’s Void,
The Deathless’s Division,
The Unborn’s Above,
The Unborn’s Below,
The Unborn’s Left,
The Unborn’s Right,
The Unborn’s Center.

Qi turns in the Void;
Life-Void enters the Void to form the covenant.
Living qi to the left,
Dying qi to the right—
The two halves complete,
One receives qi.
Pledge, contract, oath of faith.

**Right: Sound of the Fixed Resolve’s Two Halves Initially Divided.**
*(Sixty characters.)*

**The talisman writ having issued, the sound-decision remains unissued as follows:**

Nine Heavens’ Great Simplicity Yang-Born Talisman;
Three Heavens’ Great Mystery Yin-Born Talisman;
Nine Heavens’ Jade Perfected Long-An Spirit-Flight Talisman;
Three Heavens’ Perfected Birth Spirit-Flight Talisman;
Eastern Azure Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Southern Vermilion Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Central Yellow Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Western White Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Northern Black Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman.

**Right: Nineteen talismans, sounds unissued.**

Master Youxuan of Beiyue, from the Chongxuan Lodge of Mount Lu, and Li Xuanzhen of Liaodong, respectfully address fellow Dharma-practitioners and Daoist adepts:

Together we uphold Heaven’s righteousness, jointly revering the supreme enterprise, rescuing from the Three Evils, opening the ford of the Five Paths, guiding the world to flourishing fortune, and shaping the myriad things.

Now, the Three Caverns govern the turning of the kalpas, arising from the Dragon-Han. The great scriptures of the hidden treasuries remain undisclosed in their full manifestation. The essential decisions of the Lingbao One Vehicle’s talisman-diagrams have yet to be fully revealed to the world. In this latter age, those who rely on and receive them grow ever fewer, while errors and omissions multiply. The texts and meanings are rife with discrepancies, deviating from the ancient forms. With few enlightened masters, there is no means to seek or obtain them.

Surveying the scriptures and diagrams revered by fellow practitioners, errors and distortions abound. Though some have concentrated their true essence and steadfastly preserved them, the texts remain largely spurious. The vulgar and competitive crowd, recklessly grasping at scriptures and methods, all claim that by forming covenants with the Five Thearchs and binding themselves to the Dao’s Primordial Beginning, wielding numinous talismans and wearing the insignia of immortal offices, they may rely on their lofty positions to ascend as immortals. Some conceal their forms in secluded peaks, ingesting arts for years on end, their aspirations aligned with herding sheep, their grasp reaching the source of the Dao.

Yet I observe that among fellow practitioners in the world, many bury themselves in remote regions. Advancing, they find no enlightened masters to emulate; retreating, they lack the teachings of the Three Perfected of the Ge lineage. Presumptuously claiming transcendence, they in truth remain mired in emptiness. Upon earnestly examining the principles, it is not that transformation is inherently difficult—rather, it is due to the shallow knowledge of masters and companions, the incomplete transmission of the heritage. Desiring to fathom the luminous mechanism, they are hindered by vast distances and obstacles. Hoping to cross the vast waves, they lack the boat and oars. Their lives pass in sorrow, the path of seeking severed, their years spent in vain, with no awakening or realization.

I, in my humble and lowly state, have fortunately encountered this era. Formerly, I was molded by my teacher’s Perfected guidance, gradually undergoing transformation. Unworthily, I have been extended and supported for over seventy years, yet I have not been able to refine the returning elixir or sustain myself through ingestion and control. Gazing upward at the supreme texts, I have truly forgotten the frost and summer. Studying and perusing the secret records, I have roughly sought to encompass them, yet what I have pursued remains unseen, and I have gathered but a handful.

On the eighth day of the third month in the *gengwu* year, at the lecture seat, I commanded my disciple Wang Yanzhen to open the treasure terrace of my late teacher. Suddenly, from within a brocade-woven bundle, this single scroll was discovered. The assembled disciples gazed in astonishment, their joy and felicity profound. From birth to maturity, they had never heard of or witnessed its transmission.

Thereupon, I offered three taels of gold into the limpid depths of the abyss, reverently receiving the instruction of the Mysterious Master and accepting this text. By the *bingzi* year, seven years had passed, and I transmitted this text to fifty-eight disciples.

The Dao is magnified through people; the supreme transformation should be equitably shared. Now, I dispatch my disciple Wang Yanzhen to proclaim what has not yet been heard. If you have not yet formed an altar covenant, you may receive the decision at the altar. If you have already received the covenant, you may transcribe this scroll onto plain silk, purifying yourself for seven days—or five days or three days—then reverently open and commence the fast.

If transmitting to a new covenant, cease at the former pledge. Receiving this scroll alone may be done with one-third of the original pledge. The Heavenly Perfected treasure their worth; they cannot be summoned in vain. People possess inherent conduct; affairs arise from the heart’s resolve. Do not coerce or entice others to comply with their wishes.

Guard this well; keep it secret.

**The Supreme Method of the Golden Mother of Shangqing for Seeking Immortality concludes.**

chunks.original_text: 上清金母求仙上法 经名：上清金母求仙上法。 唐庐山道士李玄真撰。 慕集译解灵宝经中符文。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部神符类。 上清金母求仙上法 庐山李玄真演 王母请问太上道君曰：不审灵宝经中符图，则有文字，其文秘隐，未蒙训授，夙夜祇仰，难触灵颜。 妾诚猥陋，任居总真，未审符诀，可得便授，开悟未闻，如蒙晓究，则遭启拔，运遇自然。 道君曰：夫灵宝之文，生乎龙汉，至于今日，累经劫运，有若尘沙之数。 符图宝秘，文字幽昧，昔元始火炼真文，莹发光芒，文字既显，吾得晓焉。 元始天尊登命五老，辅卫五篇真文符诀，幽藏金阙之内，自非得道成真，莫得知究。 昔元始天王於金格玉台之上，赐授众符音诀，听传有道之人，云一劫之周，当有邈世高贤，白帝西灵之质，请求此文。 子今有问，其验已明，辄不隐藏，演而宣之。 子宜宝录，慎勿轻宣，若有得者，仙道便成。 今缮为一卷，先画真符，诀解其音，唯有太素阳生一十九符，缄秘其文，在大小劫中，来运冀有可期。 今传子灵宝见出真符，解音如左。 卷内符并朱书。 第一解五方真文十符音 音曰：九气青天，以明正道，摄气，众真所宝。 宛。 十七字。 音曰：日月以定，山水以开，三天大庆，群真徘徊。 十六字。 右东方二符音。 音曰：元始上帝，以开天地。 八字。 音曰：玉音吐气，三素以法，保命定仙，玉历定封。 十六字。 右南方二符音。 音曰：总摄群仙，制召河源。 八字。 音曰：总召天地，九元以判，同系王气，上帝遥观。 黄帝。 十八字。 右中央二符音。 音曰：行真摄气，正万神。 七字。 音曰：策驾五老，西盻九都，亿劫同会，明定九河。 罗天。 十八字。 右西方二符音。 音曰：玄高玉清，摄召北酆。 八字。 音曰：北斗定会，九期景散，八极明石，玄滋。 十四字。 右北方二符。

chunks.original_text: 第二解策板上下二符音 音曰：天灵步兵，太一升天，在地开曰生天命威命主尸星王地命出月天地度。 二十八字。 右策板上符音。 中板别文 音曰：慧昌斩开山庭人。 七字。 第三解绛杖中五符音 右绛杖中五符音。 本命符亦依方用文。 第四解二十四生三部符音 上解上部八符音。 每四字为一首，合三十二音。 右中部八符音。 每四字为一首，合三十二音。 右下部八符音。 每四字为一首，合三十二音。 第五解八景箓五方魔王姓讳符音 右八景箓五方魔王　姓讳符音。 其文一体，诀有二首。 第六解三部八景三篇玉文符 音曰：上天虚无，玄洞九五，太上阿房，统灵威户，玉衡摄气，脑华玄睹，统御上部，通神达古。 三十二字，青笔书文。 音曰：赤明开真，三天气和，洞丹阳光，五藏不枯，丹天所保，朱宫扶苏，纳炼流泉，生元无徂。 三十二字，紫笔书文。 一云三气所保。 音曰：黄中理气，元生自在，胃管幽通，六腑俱存，白元公子，桃康德淳，养育朱丹，洞神往还。 三十二字，黄笔书文。 一云元生自尊。 右三部八景三篇玉文符音。 合九十六言。 第七解八景箓后符 音曰：日月七星，上三天元，合九祖父母，太真科盟，仙人玉女，洞八十一灵宝镇真师王君，度某甲魂真，生死同盟。 右八景箓后符音。 第八解五方五牙玉文符音 音曰：东方青牙，服食青牙，饮以朝霞。 十二字。 音曰：南方朱丹，服食朱丹，饮以丹池。 十二字。 音曰：中央戊己，昂昂太山，服食精气，饮以醴泉。 十六字。 音曰：西方明石，服食明石，饮以灵液。 十二字。 音曰：北方玄滋，服食玄滋，饮以玉饴。 十二字。 右解五方五牙玉文符音。

*"The heavens above are void and nonexistent; the Mysterious Cavern’s nine and five, the Supreme’s E-Pang, governs the numinous and awesome portal. The Jade Balance gathers qi; the brain’s blossom gazes into the Mysterious. It commands the Upper Division, communicating with spirits and reaching antiquity."*
*(Thirty-two characters, written in blue-green ink.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Vermilion Clarity opens the true; the Three Heavens’ qi harmonizes. The Cavernous Cinnabar shines with yang radiance; the five viscera do not wither. Protected by the Cinnabar Heaven, the Vermilion Palace supports renewal. Ingesting and refining the flowing spring, the primordial life knows no decay."*
*(Thirty-two characters, written in purple ink.)*
*(One version reads: "Protected by the Three Qi.")*

**Sound says:**
*"The Yellow Center governs qi; primordial life arises in freedom. The stomach’s duct communicates in seclusion; the six bowels are all preserved. The White Primordial Lord, Peach Blossom’s virtue pure, nurtures the Vermilion Cinnabar. The Cavern Spirit comes and goes."*
*(Thirty-two characters, written in yellow ink.)*
*(One version reads: "Primordial life arises in dignity.")*

**Right: Sounds of the Three Divisions’ Eight Radiant Three Chapters of Jade Text Talismans.**
*(Total: ninety-six words.)*

**Seventh: Talisman Following the Eight Radiant Registers**

**Sound says:**
*"Sun, moon, and the seven stars, the upper Three Heavens’ primordial, unite with the nine generations of ancestors. By the Great Perfected’s statutes and covenant, the immortals and jade maidens, the Cavern’s eighty-one Numinous Treasures’ Guardian Perfected Master King, deliver so-and-so’s hun-soul. In life and death, we share this covenant."*
**Right: Sound of the talisman following the Eight Radiant Registers.**

**Eighth: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Teeth Jade Text Talismans**

**Sound says:**
*"Eastern Bluegreen Tooth: consume and ingest the Bluegreen Tooth; drink the morning mist."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Southern Vermilion Cinnabar: consume and ingest the Vermilion Cinnabar; drink from the Cinnabar Pool."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Central Wu-Earth: lofty and towering, the Great Mountain. Consume and ingest the essence and qi; drink the sweet spring."*
*(Sixteen characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Western Bright Stone: consume and ingest the Bright Stone; drink the numinous liquid."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Sound says:**
*"Northern Mysterious Essence: consume and ingest the Mysterious Essence; drink the jade syrup."*
*(Twelve characters.)*

**Right: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Teeth Jade Text Talismans.**

chunks.original_text: 六＋四字。 第九解五方五称符音 音曰：东明都官，召录青天，徘徊星宿，二气朗分。 音曰：南生百辽，三气乘玄，召真躬伏，莫不辅灵。 音曰：西乘佩真，玉道厘素，禁制虎豹，纲维定布。 音曰：北玄大神，统乘元纲，七斗回转，百魔自藏。 音曰：中御八方，豁若龙飞，左佩火铃，天罗抗辉。 右解五方五称符音。 第十解定志两半初分音 无死之元，无死之玄，无死始，无死空，无死分，无生上，无生下，无生左，无生右，无生中。 气转空，生空入空以为盟。 生气左，死气右，两半成，一受气。 券约信誓。 右解定志两半初分音。 六十字。 牒符已出，音诀未出如左： 九天太素阳生符； 三天太玄阴生符； 九天玉真长安神飞符； 三天真生飞神符； 东方青帝阳九百六三符； 南方赤帝阳九百六三符； 中央黄帝阳九百六三符； 西方白帝阳九百六三符； 北方黑帝阳九百六三符。 右一十九符，音未出。 庐山崇玄馆北岳游玄先生，辽东李玄真敬白同法先生道士：相与天义，共崇至业，接济三恶，开津五道，导世隆福，陶钧万物。 夫三洞御运，起乎龙汉，大国幽藏，不备显行，灵宝一乘符图旨诀，未悉出世，末代资禀，阙少弥众，文义舛谬，乖违旧体，既寡明匠，取处莫因。 历观同法所奉经图文字，僻误往往非一，虽复凝真犹固，其文多伪，流俗浮竞，柔叨经法，皆谓关盟五帝，与道元始结缘，秉持灵策，佩服仙官，自恃任高，升仙可克。 或遁形幽岫，饵术弥年，志契牧羊，操极道源。 但见世上同法之徒，埋身孤乡，进无明师可范，退无葛氏三真之训，擅称超俗，其实顿空。 笃寻其理，容非难化，皆由师友知浅，承业不备，欲究明机，限隔阔阻，希济沧波，事阙舟航，缄惨毕生，涉求路断，徒销岁纪，终无感悟。 予以猥侧，运逢幸际，昔蒙师真，陶渐至化，忝荷推延，七十余载，未能挹炼还丹，服御自持，仰寻至文，实忘霜夏，研览秘籍，粗欲徧周，趣求未见，取毕寸衿。 到今庚午年三月八日，於讲座令弟子王延真，开先师宝台，忽於织成蕴中，得此一卷，骇众互窥，喜庆交深，生来及长，未闻传见。 於是便投黄金三两，於清泠之渊，仰禀玄师，奉受此文。 到丙子岁，踰涉七年，辄以文传弟子五十八人。 夫道由人弘，至化宜均，今遣弟子王延真，宣布未闻，若未盟坛，可於坛授诀。 若已受盟，可缃素起此一卷，清斋七日，亦可五日三日，於斋绾启虔。 若授新盟，止於旧信，单受此卷，可以三分一信。 天真宝贵，不可空招，人有本行，事出心志，勿逼劝诱适人愿也。 慎之秘之。 上清金母求仙上法竟

**Sixty-four characters. Ninth: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Appellations Talismans**

**Sound says:**
*"Eastern Bright Capital Bureau: summon and record the Azure Heaven; wander among the starry lodges, where the Two Qi brightly divide."*

**Sound says:**
*"Southern Life of the Hundred Liáo: the Three Qi ride the Mysterious; summon the Perfected to bow in submission—none fail to assist the numinous."*

**Sound says:**
*"Western Riding the Girdled Perfected: the Jade Dao refines the plain silk; restrain and command tigers and leopards, the net and mesh firmly spread."*

**Sound says:**
*"Northern Mysterious Great Spirit: govern and ride the Primal Net; the Seven Dipper revolves, and the hundred demons hide themselves."*

**Sound says:**
*"Central Charioteer of the Eight Directions: vast as a dragon in flight; girded on the left with the Fire Bell, the Celestial Net resists radiance."*

**Right: Sounds of the Five Directions’ Five Appellations Talismans.**

**Tenth: Sound of the Fixed Resolve’s Two Halves Initially Divided**

The Deathless’s Origin,
The Deathless’s Mysterious,
The Deathless’s Beginning,
The Deathless’s Void,
The Deathless’s Division,
The Unborn’s Above,
The Unborn’s Below,
The Unborn’s Left,
The Unborn’s Right,
The Unborn’s Center.

Qi turns in the Void;
Life-Void enters the Void to form the covenant.
Living qi to the left,
Dying qi to the right—
The two halves complete,
One receives qi.
Pledge, contract, oath of faith.

**Right: Sound of the Fixed Resolve’s Two Halves Initially Divided.**
*(Sixty characters.)*

**The talisman writ having issued, the sound-decision remains unissued as follows:**

Nine Heavens’ Great Simplicity Yang-Born Talisman;
Three Heavens’ Great Mystery Yin-Born Talisman;
Nine Heavens’ Jade Perfected Long-An Spirit-Flight Talisman;
Three Heavens’ Perfected Birth Spirit-Flight Talisman;
Eastern Azure Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Southern Vermilion Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Central Yellow Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Western White Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman;
Northern Black Thearch’s Yang Nine Hundred Sixty-Three Talisman.

**Right: Nineteen talismans, sounds unissued.**

Master Youxuan of Beiyue, from the Chongxuan Lodge of Mount Lu, and Li Xuanzhen of Liaodong, respectfully address fellow Dharma-practitioners and Daoist adepts:

Together we uphold Heaven’s righteousness, jointly revering the supreme enterprise, rescuing from the Three Evils, opening the ford of the Five Paths, guiding the world to flourishing fortune, and shaping the myriad things.

Now, the Three Caverns govern the turning of the kalpas, arising from the Dragon-Han. The great scriptures of the hidden treasuries remain undisclosed in their full manifestation. The essential decisions of the Lingbao One Vehicle’s talisman-diagrams have yet to be fully revealed to the world. In this latter age, those who rely on and receive them grow ever fewer, while errors and omissions multiply. The texts and meanings are rife with discrepancies, deviating from the ancient forms. With few enlightened masters, there is no means to seek or obtain them.

Surveying the scriptures and diagrams revered by fellow practitioners, errors and distortions abound. Though some have concentrated their true essence and steadfastly preserved them, the texts remain largely spurious. The vulgar and competitive crowd, recklessly grasping at scriptures and methods, all claim that by forming covenants with the Five Thearchs and binding themselves to the Dao’s Primordial Beginning, wielding numinous talismans and wearing the insignia of immortal offices, they may rely on their lofty positions to ascend as immortals. Some conceal their forms in secluded peaks, ingesting arts for years on end, their aspirations aligned with herding sheep, their grasp reaching the source of the Dao.

Yet I observe that among fellow practitioners in the world, many bury themselves in remote regions. Advancing, they find no enlightened masters to emulate; retreating, they lack the teachings of the Three Perfected of the Ge lineage. Presumptuously claiming transcendence, they in truth remain mired in emptiness. Upon earnestly examining the principles, it is not that transformation is inherently difficult—rather, it is due to the shallow knowledge of masters and companions, the incomplete transmission of the heritage. Desiring to fathom the luminous mechanism, they are hindered by vast distances and obstacles. Hoping to cross the vast waves, they lack the boat and oars. Their lives pass in sorrow, the path of seeking severed, their years spent in vain, with no awakening or realization.

I, in my humble and lowly state, have fortunately encountered this era. Formerly, I was molded by my teacher’s Perfected guidance, gradually undergoing transformation. Unworthily, I have been extended and supported for over seventy years, yet I have not been able to refine the returning elixir or sustain myself through ingestion and control. Gazing upward at the supreme texts, I have truly forgotten the frost and summer. Studying and perusing the secret records, I have roughly sought to encompass them, yet what I have pursued remains unseen, and I have gathered but a handful.

On the eighth day of the third month in the *gengwu* year, at the lecture seat, I commanded my disciple Wang Yanzhen to open the treasure terrace of my late teacher. Suddenly, from within a brocade-woven bundle, this single scroll was discovered. The assembled disciples gazed in astonishment, their joy and felicity profound. From birth to maturity, they had never heard of or witnessed its transmission.

Thereupon, I offered three taels of gold into the limpid depths of the abyss, reverently receiving the instruction of the Mysterious Master and accepting this text. By the *bingzi* year, seven years had passed, and I transmitted this text to fifty-eight disciples.

The Dao is magnified through people; the supreme transformation should be equitably shared. Now, I dispatch my disciple Wang Yanzhen to proclaim what has not yet been heard. If you have not yet formed an altar covenant, you may receive the decision at the altar. If you have already received the covenant, you may transcribe this scroll onto plain silk, purifying yourself for seven days—or five days or three days—then reverently open and commence the fast.

If transmitting to a new covenant, cease at the former pledge. Receiving this scroll alone may be done with one-third of the original pledge. The Heavenly Perfected treasure their worth; they cannot be summoned in vain. People possess inherent conduct; affairs arise from the heart’s resolve. Do not coerce or entice others to comply with their wishes.

Guard this well; keep it secret.

**The Supreme Method of the Golden Mother of Shangqing for Seeking Immortality concludes.**
